 You are here Home  /  Kuei Chiu 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Kuei Chiu 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Kuei Chiu 
 Collection Strategist for Social Sciences and Area Studies 
 Department:  Collection Strategies 
 
 Email 
 (951) 827-3705 
 Suggest a purchase 
 
 Kuei’s key responsibility is to identify, assess, and select resources, of all types and in all formats and languages, for collections supporting teaching, learning and research in the social sciences and area studies, including government information, and work closely with Collection Strategists for the Arts and Humanities, and Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics, to ensure support of interdisciplinary programs. Kuei holds a B.A. in modern Greek from Shanghai International Studies University, a master’s in liberal studies from Ohio State University, and an M.L.S. from Kent State University. Kuei joined the library in 1992.
